import { useState, useEffect } from "react" const BOT = () => { const [text,setText] = useState('') const [post,setPost] = useState([]) //Process each lines of text-area function handleTextArea(event){ setText(event.target.value) } function combined(){ const lines = text.split('\n').filter(line => line.trim()); setPost(lines) } useEffect(()=>{ // combined() // console.log(post) }) return (
Facebook BOT

) } export default BOT;
